user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah Thompson (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) with the additional information she requested for my job application. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com"],"subject":"Additional Information for my Job Application – John Doe","body":"Dear Sarah,

Thank you for the opportunity to provide the additional materials for my application to Tech Innovations Inc.  As requested, please find them below:

1. Updated Resume
   • Link: https://www.notion.so/John-Doe-Updated-Resume-1f00dc8fa0db81cb956bc4c8c320473d

2. Professional References
   • Link: https://www.notion.so/Professional-References-1f00dc8fa0db815f87a7edbc2b72aa1e

3. Recent Certifications & Awards (also listed in my resume)
   • AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
   • Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

Please let me know if there is anything else I can provide or clarify. I look forward to the next steps in the process.

Best regards,
John Doe
john.doe@gmail.com
(555) 123-4567"}

formatted_items.content: Email sent to Sarah with the requested information and updated links to your resume, references, and certifications. Let me know if you’d like any changes!
